mapper.select: SELECT A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO , A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NAME , A.REF_CATEGORY_NO , A.COLOR_NO , B.COLOR_NAME , B.TAG_CLASS_NAME , B.COLOR_CODE_HEX , C.EXAM_NO , C.EXAM_NAME , C.START_DATE , C.END_DATE , C.SCHOOL , C.DESCRIPTION , C.CLASS_CODE , D.GRADE_NAME AS MOCK_EXAM_GRADE_NAME , E.CLASS_NAME , E.SUBJECT_NO , E.GRADE_CODE , E.TEACHER_NO , F.SUBJECT_NAME , G.GRADE_NAME AS HAGWON_EXAM_GRADE_NAME FROM TBL_EXAM_CATEGORY A JOIN TBL_COLOR B ON (A.COLOR_NO = B.COLOR_NO) JOIN TBL_EXAM C ON (A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO = C.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_GRADE D ON (C.GRADE_CODE = D.GRADE_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_CLASS E ON (C.CLASS_CODE = E.CLASS_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_SUBJECT_CATEGORY F ON (E.SUBJECT_NO = F.SUBJECT_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_GRADE G ON (E.GRADE_CODE = G.GRADE_CODE) WHERE A.EXAM_CATEGORY_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.EXAM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.START_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(V.EXAM_NO) FROM V_EXAM_LIST V
V.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO != 1
AND V.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO != 2
AND V.REF_CATEGORY_NO IS NULL
AND V.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO = #{ categoryNo }
AND V.CLASS_CODE = #{ classCode }
AND V.EXAM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ examName } || '%'

SELECT A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO , A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NAME , B.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO AS REF_EXAM_CATEGORY_NO , B.EXAM_CATEGORY_NAME AS REF_EXAM_CATEGORY_NAME , C.COLOR_NO , C.COLOR_NAME , C.COLOR_CODE_HEX FROM TBL_EXAM_CATEGORY A LEFT JOIN TBL_EXAM_CATEGORY B ON (A.REF_CATEGORY_NO = B.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_COLOR C ON (A.COLOR_NO = C.COLOR_NO) WHERE A.EXAM_CATEGORY_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO
SELECT A.CLASS_CODE , A.CLASS_NAME FROM TBL_CLASS A
